function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Neglect of green space quality","Impact":"Negative impact on mental health and wildlife support","Mitigation":"Improve the quality of green spaces through better planning and maintenance","Technologies":"Advanced urban planning and green infrastructure technologies","People":"Urban residents, wildlife","Owner":"Urban planners, local governments, environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Health risks originating from social and physical environments","Impact":"Increased stress levels and higher risks for mental illnesses","Mitigation":"Implement good practices in urban planning, such as fostering green spaces","Technologies":"Urban design and landscaping technologies","People":"Urban dwellers","Owner":"Urban planners, local governments, public health organizations"}]}
